1.content:
It's midnight in the Basil's Brush house and the party is set.

The only thing that lacks is the guests. Basil, Molly, and Stephen were waiting them and finally the ring sounded. Dave was i his room planning another "bussines".

Basil went to the door to see who was and he just get a big surprise. His familiars were there too!!! and also her girlfriend Roxy. (Note: They weren't invited.)

"What are you doing here Mortimer?" Said Basil.

"I'm just here to make a dis... eeh just to eat and maybe coquettish with a woman. jejeje BANG Bang"

"And how is Kelly?"

"He disappeared when he escaped from prison. But now i'm with my new partner Amanda. She is right out the door"

"Hi to everyone" said Amanda.

"Oh great another unplesant guest. Jajajajaj BOOM BOOM" said Basil.

"And you Bingo?"

"I was thrown of my house" said Bingo.

"Again?" said Stephen.

"Yes because I wanted to start the fireworks inside the house but instead I created a bonfire. Jajajaj Bing bing"

"I'm here because I was bored" said Roxy

"This is going to be a long night" said Basil.

"Well I'm going to see how is the dinner" said Molly.

"I'm going to see if other "invited guests" comehere" said Stephen as other guest come such as Anil, India, Madison and Ella (8 humans in total, for later)

"I'm going to see Dave is "avaliable" for party"

Basil went to his room and saw an strange looking machine that looks much like a ray.

"What is it?"

"A shrinking machine" said Dave

"And why are you doing one?"

"Here is my plan: i will shrink the stuff of all supermarkets to make more easy the transportation of products along with a growing ray. and with that were going to be rich. jajajaja" (Thunderstorm appears.)

"Well that's as intelligent as a mobile telephone... with a cable. Jjajajja. BOom boom"
said Basil.

"Said whatever you want this will work" said Dave.

"Well how about if we try it" said Basil.

"Ok point to that bed and press the red button"

Basil did it. But then Dave said: "No wait I don't want to shrunk this"

But Basil push the button and Dave and the Bed were gone.

"Huh? Master Dave? Well it seems it actually works" said Basil.

Basil took a magnifying glass to look for Dave. He found him lying in the bed and he picked him up. He was about 3 inches tall.

"Well you were right I apologize. Now where is the grow machine?"

"I haven't invented one. My mistake." Said Dave

"Ok Well... wait you have something in the head. Let me clean you"

"It must be ashes because of the ray"

Basil licked his hand and began to rub his head but the spot didn't go. "Maybe if i lick it with my tongue it will go" Basil said.

"Maybe" said Dave.

Basil began to lick him and... he noticed the flavor. It was liked roasted chicken. He stared to lick it like a candy.

"Basil what are you doing?" asked Dave.

"You're delicious, you know?

"Let me go, let me go" said Dave as he realized what Basil was going to do but Basil put him in a glass.

Basil's stomach stared to moan then he run to the door to see if there was any food left; there wasn't. He then thought that he could at least have a "tiny" meal. But he also thought it would be selfish to have that delicious meal for himself.

"Mortimer, Bingo, Roxy. Come here a moment please" said Basil

The 3 foxes went to Dave's room and they asked him if there was going to be more food because the others didn't left food.

"Oh I have a better meal for us all" Basil said as he show the shrunken Dave to the others.

"Him?" And what is the other joke? Having frogs for dessert?" said Mortimer.

"Before you say something licked him first" said Basil.

The other foxes licked him and... also liked the chicken flavor of Dave.

"MMM tasty" said Mortimer.

"Sweet... and salted" said Bingo.

"The best that I have ever taste" said Roxy.

"And we can have more like this using the shrinking machine"

"Ok now what is the plan for eating the others guests?" said the 3 foxes

"Here it is..." stared to said Basil.
1.title: Let the party begin

choices: or maybe you want to see the foxes route
11.content:
"Right?" said Basil

"All right" said the others.

Basil went to the door and shouted to Ella saying that there was a secret of Molly he want to tell her.

"Ohno you won't Basil. We agree you wouldn't tell the... eeh nothing" Molly said as he tried to catch Ella as he run to Dave's room.

"Great. Kill two birds with one stone" thought Basil.

Both girls entered to the run and saw Basil pointing them with an strange machine.

"What is that? What are you doing?" asked both.

"Let just say that we are starving" said Basil.

He then zapped both girls and putted them in a glass with Dave.

"What's going on here?" asked Molly to Dave.

"Those foxes has gone crazy; their planning to shrink us all and then... I don't know"

"Ok you little fox let us go now..." shouted Ella to Bingo.

"Don't worry you will be out... everything to it's due time. jajajaaja Bing Bing."

"I don't like his expression" said Molly.

"You're not going to like what will happen next" said Dave.

"What will happen?"

"They will tell us in a moment"

Basil was doing the same with every guest.

To Anil he said that he has a really good cook book with a recipe of Scargoj (snails). Anil thought that would be the meal of tomorrow.

To India that he wanted to give here a mike with light lasers.

To Madison that he will give her a coupun for 5 minutes free-shopping in any store of the world.

To Amanda that he has photos of Mortimer when he was a fox cub.

"Hey" shouted Mortimer.

And finally to Stephen:

"Hey Basil where is everyone?"

"They are right here in Dave's room"

"What are you doing there?"

"Just having fun and... seeing the new invention of Dave"

"Oh well I'm not interested."

"Wait Amanda says that she wants to be with you again."

"Yeah sure"

"What about Ella?"

"NO"

"Well I think I will tell Madison that you don't want to give her a... kiss"

When he heard he rapidly run to the room and opened the door. Then he saw...

"What the..."

"Say shrunk" said Basil and the other foxes.

Then he was reunited with the others and asked the same things with the same answers.

"Now what Basil?" asked Roxy

"To the living room" said Basil.

He then put the people in the table and stared to say:

"Welcome preys... I mean contestants to the Hide and Go seek hunting game. The rules are simple:
We are going to be out of this flat for five minutes and will let you have the chance to leave... alive.
You can either hide or try to get out of here.
If we don't find you in one day you can leave and try to make a growing machine.
If we find you you have two options:
to fight us and if you win you earn your freedom immediately or
be eaten.
Don't use the front door as a escape route we will be there."

"You must be kidding us right?" said Stephen.

"No if this was a joke i will do my BOOM boom"

"Yeah that's right."

"Please let us go Bay-zill. For me" said Madison.

"Sorry babe. We are starving and the chicken flavor is our weak point"

"Well we are going to be out" Basil said as he and the other foxes leave the flat.

"You have 5 minutes from now. jajajaja BOOM Bang Bing (The B trio)" said the other foxes.

"Well I think this is Dave's fault" said Stephen.

"Why?"

"Because you did the shrink ray, you let Basil lick you and you didn't make a growing ray!!!!" said Molly.

"I don't know you. I don't want to be eaten so I will leave" said India.

"I got an idea. What about if we form groups of two?" said Anil.

"That's.. a good idea. I think you are only intelligent when you are in mortal danger" said Dave.

"Well everyone separate and try to find a way out"

Choose what route you want to follow.
11.title: Trap room and a hunting game

111.content:
"Well Dave think we should go the window in the kitchen"

"It's far from here" said Dave

"You have a better idea? we cannot use the front door and hiding is not a good idea"

"Ok I will go"

"FOUR MINUTES" said Bingo.

"Let's get hurry" said Stephen.

Stephen and Dave quickly get down of the table and stared to run to the kitchen.

"THREE MINUTES" said Mortimer.

"Ok now how we are going to climb this?"

"Look the microwave cable."

They stared to climb the table and they do it quickly.

"Ufff... I maybe become mountain climber if i get out of here" said Stephen

"That will not happen if you keep talking and if we stay here" said Dave.

"TWO MINUTES" said Basil.

"Ok now how we are going to pass the sink?"

"Well I think we only have to walk around it. Through that way." said Dave.

"ONE MINUTE" said Roxy

"Well now to go down the window" said Dave.

"We can go if we use the cable of the blender" said Stephen.

"It's heavy" said Dave as he try to pull it out.

"C'mon try harder" said Stephen as he helped him.

"OK TIME IS OUT. LET THE HUNTING BEGINS" said Basil.

"Hurry" said Stephen.

The foxes were sniffing every place of the house; trying to find you. Stephen and Dave finally pulled the cable to the window then Stephen looked back and saw...

Slow motion: Roxy finds that Dave and Stephen wanted to escape through the window and jumped there. He tried to grab Stephen with her mouth but she fails and then she pulled the cable where Dave was and then he opened his mouth and tried to put Dave inside. Stephen then shouted: NOOOOO!!!!! But Dave jump and landed next to Stephen (ends slow motion)

"Ok little chickens tme for my dinner." she said as she stand in the window next to the sink.

"Not today" said Stephen.

"And not now" said Dave

Stephen then notice a hammer (don't ask me) inside the sink. They could jump on the other side of it and then make it fly to the tube, hit it and break it to make the water to push the fox out through the window.

He also thought they could try to get to the door with a roller-skate of Molly. It was a bit high but they could go down quickly with the towel in there.

Finally he thought that Roxy was some kind of friend of him and maybe if they talk to her and ask not to be eaten it could work.

"Dave I got and idea"
111.title: The race to escape.

choices: It hit the sink and pushed her
1111.content:
"What is it?" asked Dave.

"JUMP!!!!!" said Stephen

"What?"

"Just do it"

He obey. They both jumped and landed in the hammer. The hammer flied and...
1111.title: A desperate plan.

112.content:
"Ok what are we going to do?" asked Ella

"Hide in my room" said Molly

"Maybe we should get out of the flat" said Ella

"No they are fast and intelligent. We never will beat them by foot"

"FOUR MINUTES" said Bingo.

"Ok I will follow you." said Ellla.

Both girls try to go down to the table but it was a bit difficult for them.

"THREE MINUTES" said Basil.

"Ok now to the bedroom" said Molly

They run as fast as they could but they were a little tired of eating a lot of muffins. The stand in front of the door and crawl under it.

"TWO MINUTES" said Roxy.

"Ok now where to?"

"My little box of secrets. Nobody can open it except me.2 said Molly

"Ok where is it?" asked Ella.

"Over my desk"

"All right then let's go"

The girls climbed the desk with the cable of the computer. They didn't do it very quickly but still it was somewhat fast.

"ONE MINUTE" said Mortimer.

"Now to open it" i need to put he combination of 3 numbers."

"It is a giant safe. You cannot move it alone" said Ella.

"Well let's move it"

"First number: 2" they pushed it to right to that number.

"Second number: 7" they pushed it to the left.

But at that time.

"WELL TIME IS OVER. NOW WHERE ARE YOU OUR LITTLE MEALS." said Basil.

"On no. Hurry!!! the last number is 0. Now push for your life." said Molly.

They pushed it and when the dial was in 0 a click sound was made. This told Bingo where a person was.

"Ok now get inside" said Molly.

Slow motion: Molly runs to the box and tries to jump in it. Ella follows her but Bingo entered the room and saw them above the desk. With a rapid movement pushed them to the desk and they were surrounded by the fox. (Ends slow motion)

"Hope you will refill me and I hope you will be tasty." said Bingo.

"You will not get that chance fox" said Ella.

"We may be tiny but still will beat you." said Molly.

"And how exactly?" asked Bingo.

Molly first saw that there were things accommodated in a order that would make a bowling ball would fall in Bingo's head and with luck kill him. There was also a scissors to maintain him in the exactly point where the ball could fall.

She then notices a mouse hole small enough to fit and maybe find a way to get out of there.

Also she did know that Bingo was somewhat kindhearted and maybe they could reason with him.

"Ella follow me" said Molly.
112.title: The bedroom is not always the safest place

choices: "I will let you go... for now"
"Your words are sweet... but your meat is sweeter"
1123.content:
"Listen to us please" said Molly with a sweet voice.

"Mmm... yes?" said Bingo a bit humble.

"Can you please let us go. After all we are "friends" I know we had our differences" but now you can let us to go and make your good action of the day" said Molly.

"And a little and cute fox like you would not eat us" said Ella.

"Well let me think about it" said Bingo as he turned back.

Ella and Molly expected the best because they can't use the others choices now.

Then after a minute he turned back and then said:

"I thought of what you said and I think..."

"Yes?
1123.title: Talking with the fox cub

11232.content:
"We don't quite get what you said?" said Ella scared.

"Well let me explain you directly what I said" said Bingo.

Slow motion: With a quickly jump he grabbed Ella with his mouth and then threw her in the air. He finally caught her with his mouth and swallowed her whole (End slow motion).

"Am I clear now?" asked Bingo.

"Yes" said Molly as she tried to run. But Bingo was faster and he left here without an exit.

"Ehh Bingo please let's talk. How about if I scratch you belly" said Molly.

"Yes you can do it from inside" said Bingo as he grabbed her with his mouth and then... he swallowed whole.

"*Burp* jejeje Well that was a nice dinner. Now I think I wil have a snap. Hope that more people will come to this house so that we can have a really good feast jajajaja BING BING" said before he lay down to sleep.

(The explanations about the girls faith is not neccesary)
11232.title: Being the meal of a fox

choices: Try to slip to the front door.
113.content:
"I think we can use the bathroom's window to get out of here" said India.

"A bathroom no way. I will not go." said Madison.

"Ok you can stay here and wait to be eaten by Basil or another fox. As far I'm concerned i will get my butt out of here" said India.

"Ok now which door is the bathroom."

"FOUR MINUTES" said Roxy.

"That one. Now let's go" said India

Both girls get down of the table quickly and began to run to the door. It was not so far but still it was far away. When they reached it they crawl under the door.

"THREE MINUTES" said Bingo.

"What we are going to do now?"

"Easy climb the bathroom's sink then jump to the toilet and then get out through the window." said India

"We can use the drawers to climb" said Madison. They climbed it quickly.

"TWO MINUTES" said Mortimer.

"How are we going to jump to the lid of the bathroom." asked Madison.

"Maybe we don't have to jump. We can use the comb to make a bridge." said India.

The "bridge" was stable and the reached to the lid (upper) of the toilet.

"ONE MINUTE" said Basil.

"Oh no the window is closed" said Madison.

"Don't panic we can use the lever to open it"

"Hope it will not be hard to push."

They pushed it to the lever and when it almost opened...

"WELL THE TIME FLIES WHEN YOU ARE HUNGRY. NOW WHERE ARE YOU?" said Basil.

"Got it!!!!" said India as the window opened. But Madison walked a little backwards and knock over a bottle of mouthwash and the sound told Basil where a person may be.

"Now let's get out of here" said India.

Slow motion: India and Madison ran to the window when Basil entered and saw them. He then jumped to the window and pushed the girls with his tail. Madison and India landed in the lid (upper) of the toilet along with a bottle of shampoo. (ends slow motion)

"It seems that I am going to have two sweets for meal. jejejeje" said Basil

Madison and India tried to run to the window again but Basil was faster. He then said: "Now babes what about if you scratch my belly"

"Ok" said Madison.

"But from inside. jjejejjeje"

"You're jokes are bad and we will get out" said India

"That will be your last critic woman"

Madison then notices that the lid (down) was open and then she thought she could use the shampoo to make Basil slip inside of it and then pull the lever to flush him or at last to be stuck.

She also thought they could use the shampoo to slip under Basil feet and land in the towel and try to run to the front door.

Either she knew that Basil liked her in a relation more than a friendship also best friend of Sheila. She thought they could use her female charm to "persuade" Basil not to eat them using praises.

"India do what I do" said Madison.
113.title: Having a "clean" idea.

1131.content:
"Push the bottle" said Madison. Both girls pushed the shamppo bottle and then the shampoo covered Basil feet making him to lose the grip and fell in the cup of the toilet.

"Now jump to the lever" said Madison. They push the lever and finally the water made Basil spin.

"Ok now let's get out of here" said India.

Then both girls ran to the door and Madison said to India "After this I will not come to any party with satuid animals."

"India?" asked Madison as she turned around and she saw that India was now in Basil's mouth and then with a loud GULP he swallowed her.

"Now it's your turn sweet" said Basil.

"I suppose we cannot talk about it anymore"

"Maybe, maybe not"

"Then please let me go" said Madison.

"Sorry but I'm starving" said Basil.

"We can fix that. If you let me I will cook you in my flat"

"Well..."
1131.title: He is now wet, angry and hungry

11312.content:
"Please tell me your not going to..." said Madison

"Well yes" said Basil.

"I thought you were going to say that" said Madson as she tried to ran to the door but Basil was faster.

"C'mon you don't want to eat me just like that"

"That's right." said Basil. He then pulled out a saltshaker and pour the salt on her. And pulled out an envelope of catsup and covered her: "Now I can"

After that he grabbed Madison with his paw and he opened his mouth to put her inside. He then began to savor her and after a minute he swallowed her. He then sucked his fingers.

"Well hope that the others have already finish. But while they finish hunting I will sleep a little in my room. Then in the morning we can have new "guests" here. *Bup* Sorry. jajajajaj BOOM BOOM" said Basil as he went to his bedroom.

(I think is obvious what is going to happen to the girls)

"But you have to make him anger" said India.

"Shut up please." said Madison
11312.title: Well I think he "likes" her more

choices: They give him another chance to eat the humans.
Mortimer comes up with a different idea (readers choice).
1133.content:
"Oh...Basil dear." Madison stared up at the giant fox with little pouty lips, "Please spare us...haven't we been good friends? Please don't throw all of that away. I know you have a good heart. Besides, we've always looked up to you, with your good looks and wisdom. We...we love you Basil! Please have mercy!"

Basil looked nearly on the edge of tears as he heard her words.
"Oh...oh my. What did I almost do? I'm ashamed of myself. I let my hunger get in the way of what was truly important. Friendship!"

He picked them up in his paw and held them up to his face, "You're absolutely right, boom boom! This is nonsense...we can't just eat you like....UHHH....uh oh..."
He glanced out of the bathroom and watched as the other foxes hunted for the other humans, "The others! Their insatiable...I'll never get them to their senses! I must try to find your friends first!"

Bingo entered the bathroom behind Basil.
"Hey there...uhh...Basil? Who ya talkin to? Eh! Did ya find a human, bing bing!?"

Quickly Basil shoved the two humans into his pocket and turned to face Bingo,
"Oh...no Bingo. None in here. I was just talking to myself. Let's...uh...let's search the rest of the building, shall we."

Meanwhile, in Basil's pocket, the two girls were tossed gently around as Basil exited following Bingo.
India looked at Madison, than craned her neck up to look at Basil through the hole in the pocket, "I hope you know what your doing Madison. Even if Basil really has seen the error of his ways, we're still in big trouble. And if the other foxes find out what Basil is up to, he'll be in trouble too."

Madison put her finger to her lips and shushed India, "Do you want us to be overheard?"

But it was too late.
Bingo pointed at Basil's pocket, "I knew it bing bing! I heard voices coming from Basil...he's hoarding humans! Get him!"

Basil tried to escape, but they pinned him into a corner, "Please!" he tried to reason with them, "I was only trying to save my friends!"

The others ignored his pleas however.

"Hmph...well, he likes the humans so much, he can join them!" said Roxy, "I say we tie Basil and put him in the closet so he cannot interfere with our plans and begin our little game again, ...heh heh..."

"Wait...maybe we give him one more chance? If he'll eat those two humans in his pocket, than he's one of us again." said Bingo.

What do they decide to do with Basil?
1133.title: Basil's good heart

choices: Get rid of the fox once and for all
We will get anything you want Morty!
114.content:
"Ok now what?" said Anil.

"I don't know you. I will not be eaten by my new boyfriend. I will go back to the room of the shrinking machine and teach him a lesson." said Amanda.

"All right I will go with you" said Anil.

"But don't get in my way. Ok?" said Amanda.

"FOUR MINUTES" said Bungo.

"And hurry up please."

Both people climbed down the table and ran to the door of Dave's room and since the door was open they didn't lose time crawling inside.

"THREE MINUTES" said Roxy.

"Damn."

"What?" asked Anil.

"They destroyed the machine. They are smart." said Amanda

"Then what are we going to do now?"

"We will hide at the top of the closet. First we will climb to the desk and then climb using the lamp t get to the top."

"TWO MINUTES" said Bingo.

"and we better hurry" said Amanda.

They both climbed the desk using the chair. Both see that Dave's desk was a mess and was a little difficult to get to the lamp.

"ONE MINUTE" said Mortimer.

"What about that?" said Amanda as she saw the lamp.

"We better start to climb now" said Anil.

They climbed it and when they almost get to the top... (guess what)

"OK WE WERE WAITING FOR THIS MOMENT . IT'S MEAL TIME." said Basil.

"Oh no" said Anil as he dropped his shoe and hit the rule. The rule fly through the room and finally hit a picture which fell and created noise. This alert Mortimer that someone was in the room.

"Idiot. Jump to the top of the closet" shouted Amanda.

Slow motion: They jumped to the closet as Mortimer entered in the room and saw the little people. He then jumped to the closet and shook his tail and made them fell to the desk and while they were falling he jumped to the desk waiting with the mouth open. They missed falling inside of his mouth and landed it a soft notebook (Ends slow motion)

He then turns back and saw Amanda and Anil.

"Wel well I think i am going to have a double dinner tonight"

"This food will not be easy to eat, stupid fox" said Amanda.

"Also we are not delicious." said Anil

"I will decide that and anyway what are you going to do now?" asked Mortimer.

Amanda notice a big stick of metal from the machine. They could impaled the fox if they could push him somehow. Maybe the lamp could be enough.

She then saw that the desk wasn't pushed to the wall completely and there was a tiny place where they could go and Mortimer can't. But it was a little far.

She also now that Mortimer was a bad greedy fox but at least he could have mercy of someone that would offer him a deal and specially his new girlfriend and a person that gave him a work.

"Anil don't ask and do what I tell you" said Amanda.
114.title: Go to the beginning. Not a bright idea.

choices: It misses but he got injured
1141.content:
"You see the cable of the lamp?" said Amanda.

"Yes" said Anil.

"Pull it... Now!!!"

Then both grabbed the cable and pulled it out and the head of the lamp turned and hit Mortimer so hard that he flied in the direction of the metal stick.

"It worked" said Anil.

Mortimer was going to be impaled by the stick and then...
1141.title: Get rid of the fox once and for all

11412.content:
He got impaled by the belly. He stared to shook in there until he stopped.

"Well thet solves one problem now let's get out of here." said Anil.

As they went to the door they thought that they have to be careful with the others foxes.

Madison then said "When I tell you, run to the door Ok?" said Amanda.

"OK? I'm talking to you pay attention" she said as he turned around and saw... that Motimer was alive and out of the stick, holding Anil with his tail.

He then put Anil inside hos mouth and swallowed him. "Maybe his food was poison but he was the best snack I ever taste. jejejeje BANG BANG!" said Mortimer.

"How did you..." said amanda.

"Get out of the stick and is still alive. Well one sugestion: next time you try to kill something make sure that you hit it and the animal is really dead." said Mortimer.

"So I suggest you don't want to talk about a deal right?" said Amanda.

"You got one right" he then jumped at her and grabbed her with his mouth and savor her to finally swallow her whole.

"*Burp* I was wrong. She was the best thing i ever tasted. But will see that tomorrow when we shrunk.. the rest of the people in this flat. Jajajajjaj BANG BANG" said Mortimer.

"But now I will have some sleep and in the morning I will have more of these... humans" said Mortimer before getting to sleep

(I consider unnecesary talking about the two people that Mortimer swallowed)
11412.title: Enemy hurted is not always dead

1151.content:
"How many more we have to wait?" asked Bingo. "I'm starving and only thinking in hunting our little preys gives me more hunger."

"Relax, relax. There is no chance that they will get out of here or hide in a good place." said Basil.

"FOUR MINUTES" said Mortimer.

"What are you doing?" asked Roxy.

"Telling them the time left. It will give them more stress and fear." said Mortimer.

"Just like the voices of ghosts in the scary movies?" asked Roxy.

"Exactly"

"Well you are as scary as a tree in the dark. jajajajaj BING BING" said Bingo.

"Is that the way you want to play? Let's see who does better. In the next minute you will shout it" said Mortimer.

"Calm down you two. Remember we are here to have fun" said Basil.

"And the fun starts when? Jejejejejej BANG BANG" said Mortimer.

"THREE MINUTES" said Bingo.

"Well I give him... mmmm... 7" said Basil.

"I give him 5" said Mortimer.

"I give him a 9" said Roxy.

"See Bingo? Someone actually likes you." said Mortimer.

"But just as friend or parent when I marry her. Got it?" said Basil.

"Thanks for the proposal. But that will happen in about 1 year. OK?"

"Ok" I'm very patience" said Basil.

"You two gave me unfair notes. In that case I will give Mortimer a 3" said Bingo

"Well thanks. I always wanted to be the worst. Jeejjejejeje" BANG BANG." said Mortimer.

"I think is your turn now Basil" said Roxy.

"Ok. Ok"

"TWO MINUTES" said Basil

"10" said Roxy

"7" said BIngo

"6" said Mortimer

"I think the highest until now. jejejeje" said Basil.

"Just one more: you Roxy." said Mortimer.

"Ok" said Roxy

In that moment the foxes stomachs stared to moan again.

"Can we enter now? I think I can feel those guests in my mouth right now." said Bingo

"Stop talking about it. I imagine their flavor in my mouth too" said Mortimer.

"I told ya they will not get out. This will be fun... and tasty" said Basil.

"Hope you are right" said Roxy.

"ONE MINUTE" said Roxy.

The other 3 foxes looked at her and finally Basil said: "Like I thought. Women can scare anyone who hears them."

"JJJAjajajaja BOOM BANG BING (The B trio)" The three foxes laughed.

"You are so rude with me" said Roxy offended.

"Oh don't feel like that. I give you a 10000"

"Us too" said Bingo and Mortimer. (Note: Mortimer doesn't like Roxy or is kind all the time. The hunger is affecting him now or maybe he just is kindhearted with females foxes and humans)

"Well I think it is time" said Basil.

"Finally after a long wait some movement" said Bingo.

"It is good to stretch the legs" said Mortimer.

"I will break my diet with this but at least I'm going to do exercise" said Roxy.

"And the dinner will be served. Maybe not in a silver tray but at least this will be... interesting." said Basil.

"Maybe form groups will be a good idea. We can look for more space and in less time" said Mortimer.

"Well I think so" said Basil.

"I will go with the fox cub" said Roxy.

"What? Why?" asked Basil

"Because he is cute. jjijiijij"

"Well it's because I was made better than my uncle Basil. jajajajajaja BING BING" said Bingo.

"Hey you little..." said Basil

"Then I will be with Basil right?" said Mortimer.

"What? No way" said Basil

"What's the matter? We can eat more guests than them. Because you know the house and I will kill them for us if you want."

"It's that so? What about a bet? The team who eats more will eat the last guest." said Bingo and Roxy.

"Ok. It's a deal." said Basil and Mortimer.

Basil then pushed the door and said "WELL TIME IS OVER. LET THE HUNTING BEGINS"

"Well Basil where we should start?"
1151.title: Waiting to begin

11512.content:
"Oh please do you think they are so stupid to hide in there" said Mortimer.

"Actually I think they are" said Basil.

They stared to search for any... prey in every corner of the kitchen even in the sink.

"See? No one is here and I think the other two have already found two people" said Mortimer as he stared to go.

"Wait we forget the fridge" said Basil as he saw the fridge's door open

"Oh come on. No one is so idiot to hide in a fridge" said Mortimer.

They then opened the fridge and look inside and saw anil trapped in a strawberry jelly.

"Ok I retract of what I said. Maybe the others are also idiots" said Mortimer.

"No. Just Stephen and this one" said Basil. "So? You want this... dessert?"

"Na. I don't like strawberry jelly. Besides he must be rotten Jejejeje Bang Bang"

Then Basil began to eat the jelly. He left Anil for the final bite.

"Please tell me we can solve this" said Anil.

"Of course we can. You will be swallowed whole and without pain." said Basil. Then he bite the last part of jelly and swallowed Anil whole.

"Well you were right Mortimer. He was a little rotten but the strawberry jelly cover his flavor." said Basil.

"Did you enjoyed him? Because we have to be looking for more" said Mortimer.

"Did you look in the freezer? It's also open."

"Oh give me a break. You were right with the fridge but with the freezer? I mean..." said Mortimer as he opened the freezere and saw Dave inside a chocolate ice cream.

"Well I never thought that Dave could have bad ideas" said Basil.

"Ok I get it. You know them well because you live with them. Now Basil if you please excuse me; this one is mine" said Mortimer.

"Go ahead then" said Basil.

"Wait. I know you hate me but what about if we make a deal or something."

"Yes. If you are tasty I will enjoy youu more" said Mortimer.

Mortimer put some chocolate syrup in Dave and then with a spoon he put Dave inside his mouth and began to savor him. He finally swallowed him.

"Did you like him?" asked Basil.

"I always liked the chocolate things. But why did he hide in the freezer?" asked Mortimer.

"Maybe he got ideas... frozen. jajajajaj BOOM BOOM" said Basil.

"Well let's continue now which way?"

"Maybe they hide in the bedrooms" said Basil.

"Stephen's or Dave's bedroom? Because I think the others are in Molly's bedroom right now"

"Well..."
11512.title: The first victims. Jelly and ice cream desserts

info.brief_description: The foxes are hungry and they will eat anything even humans.
info.description:
I don't own the Basil brush characters or personalities. I also don't own the shrink ray.

Rules:

1) Soft oral vore only

2) Only the foxes can vore and shrunk except themselves.

3)The foxes are:

Basil Brush (of course)
Cousin Mortimer Trouble Brush
Bingo Brush
Roxy An artic fox(Basil's girlfriend)
(By the way the foxes are now real foxes, they can feel, they can be hurted)

4) They can play with their preys. Some sorta hide and go seek game (don't use this. I used in the plan 1) if you like.

5) No sexual stuff. For god's sake.

6) Finally add your own ideas and have fun.

Final rule: The humans can't shrunk the foxes
